description: Describes the specified registry in detail.

parameters.name: RegistryId
parameters.description: This is a wrapper structure that may contain the registry name and Amazon Resource Name (ARN). RegistryName (string) --- Name of the registry. Used only for lookup. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided. RegistryArn (string) --- Arn of the registry to be updated. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided.

nested_items.name: RegistryArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the registry.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the registry was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the registry was updated.
